rows.text_1: Take a moment for yourself first.

text_1.eng: Take a moment for yourself first.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: It is great to hear you are feeling positive today. You make a real difference for your family!

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Life has its great and hard moments – that is okay. You are on the right track.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: It is normal to have hard days as a parent. Take a deep breath and know you are not alone!
